note:
Trying to find hope in a world which feels like a slow motion video I can only helplessly watch as our selfishness & basest emotions get used by the powerful to divide and weaken. I don't like labels but I'm always rooting for the little guy...

Besides being a pessimist when I'm free, mostly husband, dad, coder, (not necessarily in that order though ðŸ˜”). Love music, like baking & hoping someday to start projects with the pi3 I bought years ago!
